kwb.resilience 0.1.0

R Package for the Quantification of Technical Resilience

kwb.resilience allows quantification of a number of resilience indicators. Calculation requires a time series of performance values of a technical system, as well as values for acceptable and worst case performance.

Installation

```{r echo = TRUE, eval = FALSE}

Optionally: specify GitHub Personal Access Token (GITHUB_PAT)

See here why this might be important for you:

https://kwb-r.github.io/kwb.pkgbuild/articles/install.html#set-your-github_pat

Sys.setenv(GITHUB_PAT = “mysecret_access_token”)

Install package “remotes” from CRAN

if (! require(“remotes”)) { install.packages(“remotes”, repos = “https://cloud.r-project.org”) }

Install KWB package ‘kwb.resilience’ from GitHub

remotes::install_github(“KWB-R/kwb.resilience”) ```
